extendedInfo.description: i-Libra Mobile introduces the power of wireless trading for the convenience of active investors, at anytime, anywhere! Investors will enjoy a level of mobility not seen before. You can now capitalise on market opportunities with wireless access to real-time trading, order status, stockmarket information. Furthermore, i-Libra Mobile provides a safe and secure trading environment. This service is easy to use and gives investors the power to trade directly on Bursa Malaysia, all from your wireless mobile device. In a dynamic stockmarket, you will need to stay informed, and be in control of your investments, whenever and wherever. Benefits of i-Libra Mobile Easy to use with absolute convenience! This service is easy to use. You have the power of wireless access to manage your investment at your fingertips, providing absolute convenience for active investors. Trade with complete trust! i-Libra Mobile ensures you are trading in a safe and secure trading environment.
